basics.name: John Felix Odhiambo
basics.label:
I'm a devoted, multi-skilled ICT professional. I'm experienced in design & implementation of complex ICT projects & services that has improved the efficiency & performance of organizations (in Hospitality, Insurance, Property, Music, Education, ICT, & Agriculture sectors). I've extensive experience in setting up and support of ICT Infrastructures,  hardware, software & communication systems, including servers,  workstations,  networks,  internet/wifi hotspots, ERPs, websites,  domains and other hosted/shared systems, just to mention but a few.

 I'm proficient in systems and people management with excellent communication and reporting skills. I'm a relentless optimist,  realist, dynamic,  enthusiastic,  energetic and a team player with unbreakable belief integrity & honesty. I'm able to multitask and work under great pressure in a fast paced environment. I'm highly trainable and I apply logical approach to problem solving scenarios. I'm articulate, focused, generously ambitious and innovative in my tasks. 

I possess high degree level of integrity & confidentiality. I'm competent,  high caliber professional with over 10 years working experience.  I'm passionate and believe in achieving goals successfully through networking and mentorship.  I get my inspiration from reading success stories & inspiring articles.

Over the years I have developed leadership and managerial skills including Excellent Interpersonal, Communication, Negotiation, Organizational Skills & ICT Project Management. I have goals to be the best I can be in ICT world.

work.company: MANRIK HOTELS & LODGES, Ol Tukai Lodge - Amboseli, Amboseli National Park, Kenya
work.desc:
Currently stationed at Ol Tukai Lodge (www.oltukailodge.com) in  Amboseli National Park, reporting to The Group ICT Manager/General Manager,  I'm tasked with research,  planning,  installations,  customization,  implementation,  repair & maintenance, to the best practices standards of all ICT Projects with a view of promoting & enhancing achievement of sole business objectives, and in line with Mission & Vision of Ol Tukai Lodge in particular, and MANRIK HOTELS & LODGES in general.

At Ol Tukai Lodge, I also ensure the following are available, up and running as required:-
1. LAN
2. Primary Internet and Secondary Internet from ISP
3. OperaPMS Server
4. IFC Server
5. MicrosPOS Server
6. CCTV Network
7. Telephony System
8. Ol Tukai WiFi Hotspot
9. Shared Printing/Scanning/Copying Services
10.Guest Business Center

Achievements at Ol Tukai Lodge:-
1. LAN Reorganization with setup of a new Network Switch - February 2017
2. Installation of 3 more CCTV Cameras  (at Main Gate, Guest Drop Off & Restaurant)- February 2017
3. Expansion of Ol Tukai WiFi Hotspot by setting up 3 more UniFi AP LR Devices - February 2017
4. New network link for Gift Shop - February 2017

Conduct all ICT Consultancy services for complex ICT Projects (ERP Implementation,  Auditing,  Security, Networks, etc) for client companies and organizations. The following is a list of Achievements (just to mention but a few):-
1. ICT Systems Audit & Recommendations- Security Group Africa (SGA, Kenya) - 2015
2. Deployment of Salon & Spa Management System - LeonLorra Beauty Palace - 2016
3. Deployment of Digital TV, CCTV Security & WiFi Hotspot Systems - LeonLorra Beauty Palace - 2016
4. Deployment of Financial Management System (Quickbooks Premier Accounting & POS System) - LeonLorra Beauty Palace - 2016
5. Design & Production of Business Cards, Leaflets & Brochures - LeonLorra Beauty Palace - 2016
6. Design, Deployment, Implementation & Management of Online Marketing & Social Media Pages - LeonLorra Beauty Palace - 2016
7. Research, Design & Production of Company Logo - Umbkeru Ltd - 2016
8. ICT Systems Audit & Recommendations - Associated Motors Ltd - 2017
9. Implementation of Enterprise Resource Programs (ERP) - Associated Motors Ltd - 2017

work.company: JAMBO Chester Hotels & Resorts, Nairobi, Mombasa, Kisumu & Laikipia
work.desc:
Prepare strategic and operational plans for the Information Communications Technology (ICT) department to ensure that all necessary ICT tools, processes and systems are in place to meet the requirements of the business and contribute to the achievement of short- and long-term goals of The Monarch Group (TMG) & JAMBO Chester Hotels & Resorts (JCHR). Manage and provide oversight for the implementation of an ICT systems, security strategy and disaster recovery plan that minimizes the risk of data loss. Ensure development, implementation and maintenance of all policies related to ICT services, including procurement, distribution and asset management. Develop and manage the planning and budgeting for the ICT services to ensure that resources are used to provide best in class ICT services that are in line with TMG & JCHR growth.
Develop sourcing strategy to ensure appropriate procedures are in place to select equipment and services vendors. Oversee the implementation and maintenance of technology infrastructure in line with TMG & JCHR growth plans, and changing business requirements or technological advancements. Oversee ICT special projects, including planning, scheduling, managing and progress reporting for system implementations. Lead a team of professionals within own area of control. Directs and supervises subordinates to ensure they fulfill their duties in the ICT function

Team Leader, Information & Communications Technology for The Monarch Group of Companies comprising:-
- The Monarch Insurance Co. Ltd
- African Conservation Tourism (ACT)
- Chester House Ltd (Chester House Apartments-Nairobi)
- Anglo African Property Holdings Ltd.
- Fiesta Restaurants Ltd (Fiesta, Level4 & Myks Lounge)
- Tamasha Corporation Ltd

	Data Security, Maintenance & Support  of the following mission-critical systems:-
	Servers running Microsoft Windows Server 2008 64-bit for:-
•	Exchange Server running Microsoft Exchange Server 2007 Standard 
•	Fidelio OPERA Xpress Property Management System 
	Other Servers on Microsoft Windows 2003 x86 running:-
•	SAGE Pastel Accounting
•	Payroll Management System
•	Micros/Fidelio Interface Server
•	Blackberry Enterprise Services 
•	Biometric Time & Attendance Management
•	ICTportal & Support Help Desk (http://ictportal/helpdesk)
	Microsoft Office Applications Suite
	Broadband Internet
	LAN & WAN
	Wireless Hotspot Internet Service for 84 of various tastes & décor 
	Data Security & Disaster Recovery Preparedness
	Leading role in registration and hosting of monarch.co.ke , chesterhouse.co.ke  domain.
	Crucial role in development and launching of www.monarch.co.ke & www.chesterhouse.co.ke websites.

Windows Server Administration, Comprehensive database management for SQL to Oracle Databases. LAN & WAN, web site traffic growth, Internet Hotspot Support & Maintenance.  VPN & Mission Critical Application Server Systems Administration. systems. Strategic Research, including ICT Policy Development & Implementation.
Team Leader on Project Implementations, Support Services, Prospect Presentations.and Logistics.
